column1: [[File:Jabez Olssen.png|thumb|250px|Olssen in the special features of ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers]]''.]]

column2: [[1975]]) is a New Zealand film and television editor. He has extensively worked with [[Peter Jackson]]
column3: and is currently helping with the editing of [[The Hobbit (film series)|''The Hobbit'' (film series)]]. Also
column4: he worked as an assistant editor for ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring]]''
column5: and an additional editor for ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers]]''.

column4: ''The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers''
